description: This repo holds a testing environment that can be used to see how `ngcc` works with `nativescript-angular`

scripts.copy-core-modules: mkdir dist && cd tns-core-modules-clone && cp tns-core-modules-*.tgz ../dist
scripts.prepare: npm run install-n-core-deps && npm run install-n-angular-deps && npm run pack-core-modules && npm run pack-nativescript-angular && npm run copy-core-modules && npm run copy-nativescript-angular && npm run install-test-proj-deps
scripts.use-local-deps: npm run go-to-test-proj && npm i ../dist/nativescript-angular-8.2.0.tgz && npm i ../dist/tns-core-modules-6.1.0.tgz
scripts.use-latest-deps: npm run go-to-test-proj && npm i tns-core-modules@latest && npm i nativescript-angular@latest
